title: Policy Gatekeeper
description: Turn policy checks into a visual routing system you can teach from: policy tickets, rule evaluation, escalation, and outcome signals stay visible all the way through.

title: The Kinetic Kitchen 2.0
description: Watch an AI agent workflow as a restaurant order: intake, routing, escalation, and completion. No code, no jargon. Learners see decisions, guardrails, edge-case handling, and KPI behavior as the order moves.
